montana.name: Montana
montana.message:
Welcome to the Grid Game!

Your job is to keep your population happy.

Today's forecast: It's going to be a cool summer.

costs.type: from the Grid for next season

progression.message:
Summers aren't so bad here in Montana.

Some industry has moved in!
Today's forecast: Winters are dark and people use their lights more. You will typically need 2 extra MW to keep your population happy.

You can now connect to other grids!

Remember that both players must purchase power lines.

Your population has increased.

newengland.name: New England
newengland.message:
Welcome to the Grid Game!

Your job is to keep your population happy.

If you need more power, you have to buy it from the grid. Later you will be able to trade with neighbors.

Today's forecast: It's going to be a warm summer! You will typically need a little more power in the summer.

costs.type: from the Grid for next season

progression.message: It's warm! You need a little more power than you did in the Spring.
Today's forecast: Winters are dark and people use their lights more. You will typically need 1 extra MW to keep your population happy.
It's a surprisingly cold and dark winter in New England! You'll need more power than expected...

You can now connect to other grids!

Remember that both players must purchase power lines.

Your population has increased.

arizona.name: Arizona
arizona.message:
Welcome to the Grid Game!

Your job is to keep your population happy.

Today's forecast: It's going to be a hot summer! You will typically need twice as much power in the summer.

costs.type: from the Grid for next season

progression.message:
It's a scorcher!

If you need more power, you have to buy it from the grid. Later you will be able to trade with neighbors.
Today's forecast: Winters are dark and people use their lights more. You will typically need 1 extra MW to keep your population happy.
Your solar farms don't produce as much in the winter! They are producing at about 50% capacity. Remove power tokens so you have the number shown at top.

You can now connect to other grids!

Remember that both players must purchase power lines.

Your population has increased.

Today's forecast: Looks like another really hot summer ahead...
